co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch.Input
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Input.DatasetInput, Input.InputFormatProviderInput, Input.StreamInput

    public abstract class Input
extends Object
    Defines input to a program, such as MapReduce.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Input.DatasetInput
      An implementation of Input, which defines a Dataset as an input.
      static class  Input.InputFormatProviderInput
      An implementation of Input, which defines an InputFormatProvider as an input.
      static class  Input.StreamInput
      An implementation of Input, which defines a Stream as an input.

      • fromNamespace

        Sets the namespace of the input.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the namespace of the input
        Returns:
        the Input being operated on

      • getNamespace

        @Nullable
public String getNamespace()
        Returns:
        The namespace of the input.

      • getAlias

        public String getAlias()
        Returns:
        an alias of the input, to be used as the input name instead of the actual name of the input (i.e. dataset name or stream name). Defaults to the actual name, in the case that no alias was set.

      • alias

        public Input alias(String alias)
        Sets an alias to be used as the input name.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias to be set for this Input
        Returns:
        the Input being operated on

      • ofDataset

        public static Input ofDataset(String datasetName)
        Returns an Input defined by a dataset.
        Parameters:

      • ofDataset

        public static Input ofDataset(String datasetName,
              Map<String,String> arguments)
        Returns an Input defined by a dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset

      • ofDataset

        public static Input ofDataset(String datasetName,
              @Nullable
              Iterable<? extends Split> splits)
        Returns an Input defined by a dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        splits - the data selection splits. If null, will use the splits defined by the dataset. If the dataset type is not BatchReadable, splits will be ignored

      • ofDataset

        public static Input ofDataset(String datasetName,
              Map<String,String> arguments,
              @Nullable
              Iterable<? extends Split> splits)
        Returns an Input defined by a dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset
        splits - the data selection splits. If null, will use the splits defined by the dataset. If the dataset type is not BatchReadable, splits will be ignored

        public static Input of(String inputName,
       InputFormatProvider inputFormatProvider)
        Returns an Input defined by an InputFormatProvider.
        Parameters:
        inputName - the name of the input

      • ofStream

        public static Input ofStream(String streamName)
        Returns an Input defined with the given stream name with all time range.
        Parameters:
        streamName - Name of the stream.

      • ofStream

        public static Input ofStream(String streamName,
             long startTime,
             long endTime)
        Returns an Input defined by a stream with the given properties.
        Parameters:
        streamName - Name of the stream.
        startTime - Start timestamp in milliseconds.
        endTime - End timestamp in milliseconds.

      • ofStream

        public static Input ofStream(String streamName,
             long startTime,
             long endTime,
             Class<? extends StreamEventDecoder> decoderType)
        Returns an Input defined by a stream with the given properties.
        Parameters:
        streamName - Name of the stream
        startTime - Start timestamp in milliseconds (inclusive) of stream events provided to the job
        endTime - End timestamp in milliseconds (exclusive) of stream events provided to the job
        decoderType - The StreamEventDecoder class for decoding StreamEvent

      • ofStream

        public static Input ofStream(String streamName,
             long startTime,
             long endTime,
             FormatSpecification bodyFormatSpec)
        Returns an Input defined by a stream with the given properties.
        Parameters:
        streamName - Name of the stream
        startTime - Start timestamp in milliseconds (inclusive) of stream events provided to the job
        endTime - End timestamp in milliseconds (exclusive) of stream events provided to the job
        bodyFormatSpec - The FormatSpecification class for decoding StreamEvent
